      static MCoordinate LabelPositioningUtils.alignAccordingToAngle(MBoundingBox boundingRect, double angleDeg)
      This method takes the given bounding rectangle and shifts it according to the given angle so that:
      If the angle is 0-90 the lower left corner of the rectangle is on the original position.
